series.title: The Adam and Dr. Drew Show
series.author: PodcastOne / Carolla Digital

episodes.seriesTitle: The Adam and Dr. Drew Show
episodes.title: #530: Assess Who You Are
episodes.summary: Adam and Dr. Drew open the show discussing some recent frustrations Adam has been having with his good friend Ray over his involvement in Adam's impending Spike TV show.  This leads into a wider conversation as to how people who are severely tuned out are seemingly incapable of pulling away from their bad habits.  As the show winds down they turn to the phones and the conversation on habits continues to evolve.
tags: Talk Radio
Carolla Digital The Adam and Dr. Drew Show #530: Assess Who You Are Click on this item for more information.

episodes.seriesTitle: The Adam and Dr. Drew Show
episodes.title: #529: Doug Benson
episodes.summary: Adam and Drew welcome friend of the show Doug Benson to the podcast today and they discuss alcohol, marijuana, Doug's upcoming Comedy Central TV show 'The High Court' and much much more.
tags: Talk Radio
Carolla Digital The Adam and Dr. Drew Show #529: Doug Benson Click on this item for more information.

episodes.seriesTitle: The Adam and Dr. Drew Show
episodes.title: #528: That And 50 Cents, As You Know
episodes.summary: Adam and Drew open the show discussing what's going on in Drew's world which leads into a conversation about Drew's children and how they're all in a strange portion of their lives where they're trying to figure out what's next for them.  They also discuss the journey of a friend of their's who is a now working in ER medicine, but when he met Drew & Adam he was a comedy writer.  Later they turn to the phones and speak to a caller wondering about the guy's advice to a caller from last week and another who is being asked to fire people at his office and needs advice.
tags: Talk Radio
Carolla Digital The Adam and Dr. Drew Show #528: That And 50 Cents
As You Know Click on this item for more information.

episodes.seriesTitle: The Adam and Dr. Drew Show
episodes.title: #527: From Scary to Fun
episodes.summary: Adam and Drew open the show discussing the fact that Drew recently sang the national anthem at the Los Angeles Kings game.  They then turn to the phones and take several calls including a mom who is wondering when to tell her now adults kids to move out of the family home and another who is trying to find a reasonable way to get his girlfriend to become more active and possibly accompany her to the gym in order to keep her healthy.
tags: Talk Radio
Carolla Digital The Adam and Dr. Drew Show #527: From Scary to Fun Click on this item for more information.

episodes.seriesTitle: The Adam and Dr. Drew Show
episodes.title: #526: He Was Barreled
episodes.summary: Adam and Drew open the show discussing the recent controversy surrounding Milo Yiannopoulos and his comments that led to such attention before examining what the wider reality of his personality represents.  Adam and Drew then take a walk down memory lane and Adam explains to Drew what the term 'brewing' from his childhood meant and the specific rifling of one of his childhood friends.
tags: Talk Radio
Carolla Digital The Adam and Dr. Drew Show #526: He Was Barreled Click on this item for more information.

episodes.seriesTitle: The Adam and Dr. Drew Show
episodes.title: #525: I Could Stop With The Grit Tomorrow
episodes.summary: Adam and Drew open the show discussing the famed Loveline call screener 'Tara, Don't Call Me Tara Goddamnit' and how her crappy attitude was something of a harbinger of things to come in the attitudes of young people.  They then turn to the phones and speak to a variety of callers including one with frustrating sexual side effects from his medication and another who is on a medication that his doctors advised him not to drink on who is looking to see how much latitude he has there.
tags: Talk Radio
Carolla Digital The Adam and Dr. Drew Show #525: I Could Stop With The Grit Tomorrow Click on this item for more information.

episodes.seriesTitle: The Adam and Dr. Drew Show
episodes.title: #524: There is an Evil Story That's Not Being Told
episodes.summary: Adam and Drew open the show discussing the opiate problem in America today and how Drew believes that although there were drug companies and states acting irresponsibly, the real story is that of Suboxone and the company behind the so-called treatment drug.  They then turn to the phones and speak with a caller who happens to have a question about opiate addiction leading to an expanded version of the conversation already in progress.
tags: Talk Radio
Carolla Digital The Adam and Dr. Drew Show #524: There is an Evil Story That's Not Being Told Click on this item for more information.

episodes.seriesTitle: The Adam and Dr. Drew Show
episodes.title: #523: No Right On Red Bullshit
episodes.summary: Adam and Drew open the show discussing some of the traffic woes that impact the city of Los Angeles especially when it comes to the area in and around Los Angeles International Airport. They then go on to speak about Jim Jefferies and his recent appearance on Bill Maher's TV show opposite Piers Morgan.  They then turn to the phones and speak to a caller looking for advice after his long term girlfriend broke up with him for refusing to get married.
tags: Talk Radio
Carolla Digital The Adam and Dr. Drew Show #523: No Right On Red Bullshit Click on this item for more information.

episodes.seriesTitle: The Adam and Dr. Drew Show
episodes.title: #522: It Doesn't Matter Anymore
episodes.summary: Adam and Drew open the show discussing the recent telecast of The Grammy awards and the things they enjoyed and were confused about including Drew's confusion as to why this particular art form is using so many aspects of entertainment beyond music.  Adam also tells Drew a confusing story about an observation he made regarding his dog poop situation about how it led him down a confusing road in his mind. As the show winds downthey speak to a caller who lost her husband and is at odds with his remaining family members in terms of his burial/cremation plan.
tags: Talk Radio
Carolla Digital The Adam and Dr. Drew Show #522: It Doesn't Matter Anymore Click on this item for more information.

episodes.seriesTitle: The Adam and Dr. Drew Show
episodes.title: #521: Styptic Pencil
episodes.summary: Adam and Drew open the show by going straight to the phones talking to a caller who was recently diagnosed with a disease but is being told he can't get treatment for several months as well as another who is recently out of the military and having trouble getting covered for the procedure his doctors are telling him he needs.  They also speak to a caller worried about his drinking as well as a caller who lost one of his children at a very young age and isn't finding success in therapy.
tags: Talk Radio
Carolla Digital The Adam and Dr. Drew Show #521: Styptic Pencil Click on this item for more information.

episodes.seriesTitle: The Adam and Dr. Drew Show
episodes.title: #520: Your Technique For Life Gets Passed Over
episodes.summary: Adam opens the show discussing his glasses with Dr. Drew and letting it bleed into a wider examination of the difference Adam has identified between himself and those who surround him.  They then turn to the phones and follow up with a caller whose girlfriend experienced a cardiac event before moving on to another caller who is interested in taking Adam's advice and trying to 'rewire' himself.
tags: Talk Radio
Carolla Digital The Adam and Dr. Drew Show #520: Your Technique For Life Gets Passed Over Click on this item for more information.

episodes.seriesTitle: The Adam and Dr. Drew Show
episodes.title: #519: Not With The Booze, With The News
episodes.summary: Adam and Dr. Drew open the show discussing car accidents and how different people react differently to those kinds of situations.  They also walk down memory lane and explore some music that Adam recently heard and got frustrated by before they turn to the phones and speak to a caller who is worried about how often she is having nightmares and another who is worried about her father who has been a longtime drug addict.
tags: Talk Radio
Carolla Digital The Adam and Dr. Drew Show #519: Not With The Booze
With The News Click on this item for more information.

episodes.seriesTitle: The Adam and Dr. Drew Show
episodes.title: #518: It's Un-Innovative
episodes.summary: Adam and Dr. Drew open the show discussing the Oscar darling 'La La Land' that is up for numerous awards this year.  They also discuss 'Hell or High Water' and some of the other films up for awards before they turn to the phones and speak to a variety of callers.  Before starting off with a caller who is worried about his obese mother in law they move on to another caller who has adopted several disabled children looking for help on how to have a normal marriage.
tags: Talk Radio
Carolla Digital The Adam and Dr. Drew Show #518: It's Un-Innovative Click on this item for more information.

episodes.seriesTitle: The Adam and Dr. Drew Show
episodes.title: #517: Carolla-ectomy
episodes.summary: Adam and Dr. Drew open the show discussing the recent women's march and the now planned 'women's strike' wherein every woman in the country is going to call in sick from work to send a message.  This leads into an overall conversation about narcissism and how although when negativity is brought into things people don't realize how narcissistic they are being.  They then turn to the phones are speak to a caller who is currently driving a truck but considering a career change.
tags: Talk Radio
Carolla Digital The Adam and Dr. Drew Show #517: Carolla-ectomy Click on this item for more information.

episodes.seriesTitle: The Adam and Dr. Drew Show
episodes.title: #516: Valley Forge
episodes.summary: Adam and Drew open the show discussing Adam's kids recent school trip to Valley Forge and how it led to the discovery that kids simply will not respond if you try to interrupt their sleep in the middle of the night.  They then turn to the phones and speak to a caller with a suggestion for Adam to end an annoying automotive phenomenon and another who is wondering how to help out a friend whose life is seemingly falling apart.  As the show winds down the guys take a very serious call from a former child abuse survivor who is looking to keep his abuser in jail for his full sentence and have his parole denied.
tags: Talk Radio
Carolla Digital The Adam and Dr. Drew Show #516: Valley Forge Click on this item for more information.

episodes.seriesTitle: The Adam and Dr. Drew Show
episodes.title: #515: No Lube, He Says
episodes.summary: Adam and Dr. Drew open the show discussing the Super Bowl as well as the insane drive that lives inside champions like Tom Brady and how that relates into other areas besides sports. This leads into a larger conversation about how although people with that drive can likely see it in one another, often outsiders may not be able to see such drive and realize what they have in front of them.  As the show wraps up the guys go to the phones and Adam tells Drew about a recent story he was told by Mike August regarding an upcoming medical procedure.
tags: Talk Radio
Carolla Digital The Adam and Dr. Drew Show #515: No Lube
He Says Click on this item for more information.
